about.description:
E-ANTIC is a C/C++ library to deal with real embedded number fields built
on top of ANTIC. Its aim is to have as fast as possible exact arithmetic
operations and comparisons.

name: pyeantic

about.description:
E-ANTIC is a C/C++ library to deal with real embedded number fields built
on top of ANTIC. Its aim is to have as fast as possible exact arithmetic
operations and comparisons.
